author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sino-Global Reports Qtrly EPS $0.01
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Sino-Global Shipping America Ltd :
* SINO-GLOBAL ANNOUNCES FISCAL YEAR 2018 THIRD QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SINO-GLOBAL SHIPPING AMERICA LTD Q3 REVENUE ROSE 89.3 PCT TO $5.2 MLN
* SINO-GLOBAL SHIPPING AMERICA LTD - QTRLY SHR $0.01
* SINO-GLOBAL SHIPPING - RECOGNIZED INCOME TAX EXPENSE FOR QUARTER OF $0.26 MILLION DUE TO CHANGES IN DEFERRED TAX ASSETS FOR THE THREE-MONTH PERIOD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
